Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: ஆற்று பவர்க்கும் அரண்பொருள் அஞ்சித்தற் போற்று பவர்க்கும் பொருள்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: A fort is an object of importance to those who march (against their foes) as well as to those who through fear (of pursuers) would seek it for shelter.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A massive, powerful fortress stands at the center of the image.
Layered_Composition.Midground: The fortress is shown serving two opposite purposes simultaneously. On the left side, a powerful, aggressive army ('ஆற்றுபவர்') is using the fortress as a secure base from which to launch their attack. On the right side, a group of fearful refugees ('அஞ்சி தற்போற்றுபவர்') are shown finding safe shelter within its walls.
Layered_Composition.Background: A dynamic landscape of both conflict and peace, showing the fortress's dual role as a tool of offense and a haven of defense.

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: A fortress is a valuable asset for both those who wish to project power and those who need to seek shelter from it.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The dual use of the fortress is the key theme. The aggressive army on one side and the fearful refugees on the other clearly illustrate its twofold importance.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The offensive side can be lit with the harsh, fiery light of war. The defensive side can be lit with a softer, more protective and hopeful light.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A wide, symmetrical shot that shows both functions of the fortress clearly.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with detailed depictions of both the army and the refugees.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Split lighting to emphasize the two different roles.

Cultural_Anchors: The dual nature of a fortress.

Negative_Prompt: a fortress being unused, text artifacts, cartoonish figures.
